Western Railway Allowances & Benefits 2025

Major Allowances

  • HRA (House Rent Allowance)
  • DA (Dearness Allowance)
  • TA (Transport Allowance)
  • Medical Allowance

Benefits & Perks

  • Government Accommodation
  • Medical Facilities
  • Leave Travel Concession
  • Pension Scheme
